Server.Name: Preppocalypse
Server.Description:
7D2D from the perspective of a Prepper.
Features Include: - Upgraded default zombies in the biomes, hordes, and Game Stage linked POIs - A greater abundance of Prepper style quest POIs (custom and TFP conversions) for A21 - Additional recipes that accommodate Prepper/Survivalist/Bushcrafter traits - Upgraded and custom items to facilitate survival against stronger hostiles - Custom questing opportunities as well as other game play features that are in context with a Prepperâ€™s experience of the afterwards.
